StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateNWAEDUCATION]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@nwa_id int, @educ_level varchar(2), @educ_code char(1) AS
declare @current_user varchar(50)
if (user_name()=NULL or user_name()='dbo') begin set @current_user=suser_sname() end else begin set @current_user=user_name() end
set @current_user=le.(@current_user,15)
if @nwa_id is not NULL begin update nwa set user_login=@current_user, update_date=getdate(), educa.on_level=@educ_level, educa.on_code=@educ_code where nwa_id=@nwa_id end else begin print 'NWA ID cannot be NULL' end
